0.des: Null event, cannot be activated. Completely useless

1.fmt: Object entered by anything belongs to {0}
1.des:
Triggers when a ground infantry or vehicle belong to #HOUSE# entering the attached object. Trigger with this event can be attached to a building, celltag, or unit.
If attached to a celltag, it cannot triggered by air unit crossing it.
If an eligible unit is on that celltag before the trigger enabled, this event will not triggered.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

2.des:
Triggers when a spy(defined in Ini) has entered the attached building.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

3.des:
!NO EFFECT, NEEDS REPAIR!
Triggers when a thief steals money from #HOUSE#.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

4.des:
Triggers when the attached object has been discovered(reavealed from under the shroud) by the player.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

5.fmt: Anything belongs to {0} discovered by player
5.des:
Triggers when the #HOUSE# has any of its units or buildings discovered by the player.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

6.des:
Triggers when the attached unit has been attacked by ANY house, include friendly fire. Unit death weapon such as Demotruck or plane crash WILL trigger. Damage from voxel debris will NOT trigger.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

7.des:
Triggers when the attached unit has been destroyed by ANY house, include friendly fire. Unit death weapon such as Demotruck or plane crash WILL trigger. Destroyed by voxel debris will NOT trigger.
Destroyed means hit point reached zero and destroyed, if attached unit infiltrates or captures a building, it will NOT trigger.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

8.des: This event will always considered as condition TRUE.

9.fmt: All units of {0} have been destroyed
9.des:
Triggers when all units of the #HOUSE# have been destroyed.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

10.fmt: All buildings of {0} have been destroyed
10.des:
Triggers when all buildings of the #HOUSE# have been destroyed.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

11.fmt: All objects of {0} have been destroyed
11.des:
Triggers when all units and buildings of the #HOUSE# have been destroyed.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

12.des: Triggers when the #TRIGGER HOUSE# has at least #NUMBER# of credits.

13.des:
Triggers when #TIME# seconds has expired since the trigger created/enabled. Timer WILL reset when the trigger initialized, created, or reenabled.
If created a disabled trigger, timer will NOT start.

14.des: Triggers when the global mission timer (set this timer in Action-No.27) reached zero.

15.des: Triggers when #NUMBER# of any buildings owned by the #TRIGGER HOUSE# have been destroyed, INCLUDE civilian objects.

16.des: Triggers when #NUMBER# of any units owned by the #TRIGGER HOUSE# have been destroyed, INCLUDE civilian objects.

17.des: Triggers when the #TRIGGER HOUSE# has no factories(defined in Ini) left.

18.des: Triggers when all civilian objects of the #TRIGGER HOUSE# have left the map.

19.des:
Triggers when the #TRIGGER HOUSE# builds the #BUILDING#(registed in Ini).
Created by trigger(like Action-No.125) WILL fire this event.
Buildings existed before the trigger created/enabled will NOT fire this event.

20.des:
Triggers when the #TRIGGER HOUSE# builds the #UNIT#(registed in Ini).
Created by trigger(reinforcements type) WILL NOT fire this event.
Units existed before the trigger created/enabled will NOT fire this event.

21.des:
Triggers when the #TRIGGER HOUSE# builds the #INFANTRY#(registed in Ini).
Created by trigger(reinforcements type) WILL NOT fire this event.\Infantries existed before the trigger created/enabled will NOT fire this event.

22.des:
Triggers when the #TRIGGER HOUSE# builds the #AIRCRAFT#(registed in Ini).
Created by trigger(reinforcements type) WILL NOT fire this event.\Aircrafts existed before the trigger created/enabled will NOT fire this event.

23.des:
Triggers when the #TEAM# leaves the map, this event will fire when the last team member leaves the map.
Will NOT trigger if the team is COMPLETELY destroyed.

24.des:
!ADVANCE!
Triggers when any unit belonging to #HOUSE# enters a zone with a celltag along with this trigger.
A ZONE is defined as follows:
An area which a unit can reach, or an area that a ground unit can reach using their pathfinding algorithm. A ZONE must be an isolated area considering by an individual unit.
Eg. Two land area was seperated by a river, a ground unit will consider these two lands as two seperated ZONEs, while an amphibious ground unit can reach both land and they will consider these two lands as one united ZONE. Thus, the former ground unit on the other land will not trigger this event, while the later amphibious unit will trigger this event with only ONE CELL MOVE ACTION. This also applies to landable non-aircraft unit, but it will trigger untill they landed.
Thus, ZONEs are various with different unit types.
Hovering air unit on and only on that celltag WILL fire this event, otherwise will not.
Subterannean and chrono-moving units are complicated, testing is advised.
Multiple identical tags in same zone will not cause multiple effect.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

25.des:
Triggers when any unit belonging to #HOUSE# crossed horizontal line indicated with celltag.
Horizontal line: Top-Left to Bottom-Right. Irrelevant to either side of the line, only triggers when the unit cross the line.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

26.des:
Triggers when any unit belonging to #HOUSE# crossed vertical line indicated with celltag.\Vertical line: Top-Right to Bottom-Left. Irrelevant to either side of the line, only triggers when the unit cross the line.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

27.des: Triggers when certain #GLOBAL VARIABLE#(defined in Ini) is TRUE/On/Set.

28.des: Triggers when certain #GLOBAL VARIABLE#(defined in Ini) is FALSE/Off/Clear.

29.des:
Triggers when the attached unit has been destroyed by any source of damage.
If attached unit infiltrates or captures a building, it will NOT trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

30.des:
Triggers when the #HOUSE#'s power value is lesser than drain value.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

31.des:
Triggers when a section of an attached bridge is destroyed. A section of a bridge is destroyed means a single overlay unit of a bridge's health reached zero or simply detonate from bridge repair hut, no matter the bridge is passable or not. That means even if a bridge is impassable, destroying a section WILL trigger this event.
Use this trigger by attatching in a celltag and place it under the bridge overlay(on air), or on the bridge overlay(small bridge on the ground). Placing multiple identical tags on the same bridge WILL cause multiple effect.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

32.des: Triggers when #TRIGGER HOUSE# owns at least 1 of #BUILDING#. Any source of building owned/constructed WILL trigger this event.

33.des:
!SINGLE-PLAYER ONLY!
Triggers when attached object selected by player.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

34.des:
Triggers when the attached object comes near the #WAYPOINT#.
Comes near means the target unit enters a 5-cell-raidus(include center) CIRCLE around destinated #WAYPOINT#.
If the tagged unit has already near #WAYPOINT#, this event will always be TRUE no matter how far the tagged unit will go.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

35.des:
Triggers when an enemy unit catched by the spotlight cast by the attached building.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

36.des: Triggers when certain #LOCAL VARIABLE# is TRUE/On/Set.

37.des: Triggers when certain #LOCAL VARIABLE# is FALSE/Off/Clear.

38.des:
Triggers when the tagged unit took first damage from combat.
Unit death weapon such as Demotruck or plane crash WILL trigger. Damage from voxel debris will NOT trigger.
If the tagged unit is not in full health in the beginning, then the event will NEVER trigger.
If the tagged unit is instantly terminated(by chrono-erase, logical-c4, or fall, logical executed etc.) from above half health, the event will NEVER trigger. If the tagged unit is instantly killed by heavy damage(barrel explosion etc.), it WILL trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

39.des:
Triggers when the tagged unit's hit point falls below 50 percent by and only by taking combat damage. Any damage before 50 percent of health will be ignored, only the last hit that drag health falls below 50 percent will trigger.
Unit death weapon such as Demotruck or plane crash WILL trigger. Damage from voxel debris will NOT trigger.
If the tagged unit is already below half health in the beginning, then the event will NEVER trigger.
If the tagged unit is instantly terminated(by chrono-erase, logical-c4, or fall, logical executed etc.) from above half health, the event will NEVER trigger. If the tagged unit is instantly killed by heavy damage(barrel explosion etc.), it WILL trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

40.des:
Triggers when the tagged unit's hit point falls below 25 percent(turns red) by and only by taking combat damage. Any damage before 50 percent of health will be ignored, only the last hit that drag health falls below 25 percent will trigger.
Unit death weapon such as Demotruck or plane crash WILL trigger. Damage from voxel debris will NOT trigger.
If the tagged unit is already below quarter health in the beginning, then the event will NEVER trigger.
If the tagged unit is instantly terminated(by chrono-erase, logical-c4, or fall, logical executed etc.) from above quarter health, the event will NEVER trigger. If the tagged unit is instantly killed by heavy damage(barrel explosion etc.), it WILL trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

41.des:
Triggers when the attached unit took first damage from any source.
If the tagged unit is not in full health in the beginning, then the event will NEVER trigger.
Erased by chrono will NOT trigger. Other instantly terminated(logical-c4, fall) or instantly killed(heavy damage that instantly kill a unit) methods WILL trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

42.des:
Triggers when the tagged unit's hit point falls below 50 percent from any damage source. Any damage before 50 percent of health will be ignored, only the last hit that drag health falls below 50 percent will trigger.
If the tagged unit is already below half health in the beginning, the the event will NEVER trigger.
If the tagged unit is instantly terminated(by chrono-erase, logical-c4, fall, logical executed etc.) from above half health, the event will NEVER trigger. If the tagged unit is instantly killed by heavy damage(barrel explosion etc.), it WILL trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

43.des:
Triggers when the tagged unit's hit point falls below 25 percent from any damage source. Any damage before 25 percent of health will be ignored, only the last hit that drag health falls below 25 percent will trigger.
If the tagged unit is already below quarter health in the beginning, the the event will NEVER trigger.
If the tagged unit is instantly terminated(by chrono-erase, logical-c4, fall, logical executed etc.) from above quarter health, the event will NEVER trigger. If the tagged unit is instantly killed by heavy damage(barrel explosion etc.), it WILL trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

44.des:
Triggers when the tagged unit been attacked by any source of damage from #HOUSE#.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

45.des: Triggers when the ambient light drops below #PERCENT# percent. Make sure the number is an integer between 0 and 100.

46.des: Triggers when the ambient light rises above #PERCENT# percent. Make sure the number is an integer between 0 and 100.

47.des: Triggers when #TIME# has elapsed since start of scenario.

48.des:
Triggers when the tagged object has been destroyed by any methods, include selling.
Capturing or infiltrating will not trigger.
The most common death-detecting trigger.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

49.des:
Triggers when the tagged unit picks up any crate. If the unit picks up a crate, this event will always be TRUE even been reenabled.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

50.fmt: Anything picks a crate since battle begin
50.des:
Triggers when any unit on the battlefield picks up any crate. If it happens, this event will always be TRUE for the rest of the entire combat.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

51.des:
Triggers when a random time(seconds) elapsed.
The time is ranged from 0.5x #TIME# seconds to 1.5x #TIME# seconds. This random number is calculated since the trigger enabled. Recalculated and reseted once the trigger has reenabled.

52.des: Triggers when the #TRIGGER HOUSE#'s credits falls below #NUMBER# of credits.

53.fmt: A spy disguised as {0} infiltrates anything
53.des:
!APPERANTLY USELESS!
Triggers if a spy disguised as house specified enters this.

54.fmt: A spy disguised as {0} infiltrates anything
54.des:
!APPERANTLY USELESS!
Triggers if a spy disguised as this type of infantry enters.

55.des:
Triggers when all naval units(defined in Ini) of #HOUSE# have been destroyed. Amphibious units do not count as naval units.
If new naval units constructed or reinforced after the event triggered, this event will turn as FALSE.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

56.des:
Triggers when all land units of #HOUSE# have been destroyed.
If new land units constructed or reinforced after the event triggered, this event will turn as FALSE.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

57.des:
Triggers when #TRIGGER HOUSE# does not have any #BUILDING# on the map.
If new #BUILDING# constructed after the event triggered, this event will turn as FALSE.

58.des:
Triggers when the #HOUSE#'s power value is greater or equals to drain value.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

59.des:
Triggers when an object belong to #HOUSE# entering the attached celltag. This can be triggered by moving land unit onto the celltag, or crossing from the air(if the air unit's height exceed to certain level, it will NOT trigger).
Irrelevant to trigger house.

60.des:
Triggers when there at least #NUMBER# of #TECHTYPE# exist on the map, beloning to anyone.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

61.des:
Triggers when there are no #TECHTYPE# on the map, beloning to anyone.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

65.abs: Target Beloning to House... Recover From EMP(Ares 3.0)

84.fmt: Object been attacked or destroyed by {0}

1.des:
Cause the game end immediately with declearing #HOUSE#'s victory.
Any other house will be defeated and no matter allied or not.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

2.des:
Cause the game end immediately with declearing #HOUSE#'s defeat.
Any other house will announce victory and no matter allied or not.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

3.des:
Cause the #HOUSE#(controlled by computer) will begin production of units and structures.
If #HOUSE# is human player, this action will do nothing.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

4.des:
Cause the #TRIGGER HOUSE# to create a #TEAMTYPE#.
The team will created by regrouping or constructing, not by reinforcement.

5.des:
Cause the #TEAMTYPE# dismissed. If the team still have members, all members will be available for recruiting into other teams and will NOT be killed instantly.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

6.des:
Cause all units belong to #HOUSE# start "hunting mode", they will search and destroy any enemy on the current battlefield by distance.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

7.des:
Create a #TEAMTYPE# belongs to #TEAM HOUSE# using the settings specified in team logic.
This action WILL create a bunch of units at #TEAM WAYPOINT# from nothing.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

8.des: Create a drop zone flare at #WAYPOINT#

9.des:
Cause all buildings of the specified #HOUSE# to be sold.
Typically used in final assault by computer on single player.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

10.des: Play specified #MOVIE# on full screen. The game will pause while the movie is playing, and will resume after the movie finished.

11.des:
Display specified #CSFLABEL# on upper left of the screen, all player will see this message.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

12.des: Destroy the specified #TRIGGER# and prevent it from operating, but the destroyed trigger can be re-created.

13.des:
Initiate autocrate procedure for specified #HOUSE#, typically used by computer creating teams in single player.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

14.des:
Change the beloning of attatched object to specified #HOUSE#.
Irrelevant to trigger house.

15.des:
!UNSTABLE!
Turns a virtual winning condition to TRUE.
When all trigger contains this action in current map is triggered, the player wins.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

!WARNING!
This action will sometimes crash the game.

16.des:
Reveals the entire map to the player.

!WARNING!
Using this action in multiplayer map will sometimes crash the game with reconnection error!

17.des:
Reveals a specified region around #WAYPOINT# for player.
The region size can be changed by [General]-RevealTriggerRadius.

18.des:
!ADVANCE!
Reveals all cells beloning to the ZONE specified by #WAYPOINT# for player.
You may read the description of Event.24 for a brief defination of a ZONE.

19.des:
Play a specified #SOUND#.
Irrelevant to location, always center played.

20.des:
Play a specified #THEME#.
Will override the music played by jukebox in Menu->Control, and will resume playing if the specified #TMEME# is end.

21.des:
Play a specified #EVASPEECH#.
Will override the eva sound that currently playing, and it will be override by the default priority.

22.des:
Force the specified #TRIGGER# to fire without meet the Evnet condition of that trigger.
If the trigger runs only 1 time and have not meet the Event condition yet, the designated trigger can be force triggered repeatedly, but will not be force triggered once the Event condition has been made.

25.des: Extemd the global timer for #TIME# seconds.

26.des:
Short the global timer for #TIME# seconds.
The timer can be negative, but wills show as 00:00.

27.des:
Set the global timer to #TIME# seconds.
There are only one global timer in the map.

28.des: Set the #GLOBAL VARIABLE#(defined in Ini) to TRUE/On/Set

29.des: Set the #GLOBAL VARIABLE#(defined in Ini) to FALSE/Off/Clear

30.des:
Set the computer skirmish mode to ON or OFF.
When set to ON, the computer house will set their building as in skirmish mode, the existing base nodes still in effect.
Irrelevant to ANY house

31.des:
Incress unrevealed area for one step unit. This can be modified by [AudioVisual]-ShroudGrow/ShroudRate.
Shroud regrow queue is affected by the time of which area has been revealed.

32.des: Destroy the object that attatched to this trigger.

33.des:
Add a specified #SUPERWEAPON# to #TRIGGER HOUSE#.
This superweapon may use only once, then it will disappear.

34.des:
Add a specified #SUPERWEAPON# to #TRIGGER HOUSE#.
This effect is permanent.

35.des:
Set the #TRIGGER HOUSE#'s offensive superweapon target to specified type object.
0:Nothing.
1:Anything
2:Buildings
3:Harvesters
4:Infantries
5:Vehicles
6:Factories
7:Base Defenses
8:Base Threats(Enemy in their base)
9:Power Plants
10:Occupiable Buildings
11:Neutral Tech Buildings.

36.des: Change all objects of #TRIGGER HOUSE# to specified #HOUSE#.

37.des: Make the #TRIGGER HOUSE# ally with specified #HOUSE#.

38.des: Make the #TRIGGER HOUSE# enemy with specified #HOUSE#.

39.des:
Change the zoom out level of the player's minimap.
1:Normal view
2:Zoomed Out.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

40.des:
Change the player's battlefield view rectangle into specified size and location.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

42.des: Crate an explosion at #WAYPOINT# using specified #WARHEAD#.

44.des:
!ONLY IN TS!
Start an ion storm for the specified number of game #FRAMES#.

45.des:
!ONLY IN TS!
End the ion storm in progress.

46.des:
Disable player's input. Mostly used in the beginning of single player game.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

47.des:
Enable player's input.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

48.des:
Set player's view camera to #WAYPOINT# instantly.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

49.des:
!UNSTABLE!
Zooms the tactical map in, will downscale current resolution and lock player's input.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

50.des:
!UNSTABLE!
Zooms the tactical map out, will upscale current resolution and unlock player's input.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

51.des: Reshrouds the entire map for #TRIGGER HOUSE#

52.des:
!ARES ONLY!
Change the spotlight type of the attatched building.
0:No Spotlight
1:Circular
2:Arcing.

58.des:
!ONLY IN TS!
Crates a meteor shower around #WAYPOINT#.
Use in RA2 may crash the game!
Size scales from 0-3.

60.des:
Sells the attatched building.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

61.des:
Turn off the attatched building.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

62.des:
Turn on the attatched building.
Irrelevant to ANY house.

63.des: Applies 100 points of HE damage at #WAYPOINT#, can be permanently repeated. May use this to destroy a bridge immediately.

64.des:
!NO EFFECT, NEEDS REPAIR!
Shows a small light flash at #WAYPOINT#.

65.des:
!NO EFFECT, NEEDS REPAIR!
Shows a medium light flash at #WAYPOINT#.

66.des:
!NO EFFECT, NEEDS REPAIR!
Shows a large light flash at #WAYPOINT#.

22.abs: Afraid and Move To Nearest Shroud

34.abs: Center Map On This Team At Speed...
